name: PetSafe Martingale Collar with Quick-Snap Buckle - Adjustable No-Slip Quick Release Dog Collar - Everyday Wear No-Pull Training Aid - 3/4" Wide - Small - Royal Blue
short_description: Escape Proof Dog Collar: The PetSafe Martingale Collar with Quick-Snap Buckle features a dual loop design that offers gentle tightening, keeping reactive dogs safe from slipping out during walks
Quick-Snap Buckle: Easy to put on and take off with a secure fit; the durable and adjustable nylon provides a comfortable customized fit with various sizes available to suit every dog
Better Leash Control: No-choke collar gently tightens with pulling and loosens when pulling stops, allows humane correction and reducing pulling while promoting safe, confident training
Global Mission, Local Care: With U.S. roots and worldwide reach, PetSafe delivers vet- and trainer-recommended solutions and exceptional customer support to create fields of joy for pets
25 Years of Trust: Since 1998, PetSafe has created safe, innovative, and trusted products that bring joy, enhance pet lives, and support the lifelong bond between pets and their families
product_description: The PetSafe Martingale Collar with Quick-Snap Buckle is a slip-resistant, escape-proof dog collar designed for better leash control and comfortable training. Its dual loop design gently tightens when your dog pulls, and loosens when they stop pulling for humane, no-choke correction. Made from durable nylon material, this quick-release dog collar offers a secure fit that's easy to adjust for a custom fit across multiple sizes. Ideal for reactive pets, the collar helps prevent slipping or backing out and offers a safer, more secure alternative to prong collars. The quick-snap buckle makes the collar easy to put on and take off for everyday use, and available in a variety of sizes so you can find the perfect fit for your pet. Measure your dog around the top of the neck directly behind the ears to select the right size for a fully-tightened collar. Whether used for walking control or as an everyday-wear training aid, the PetSafe Martingale Collar gives dog owners confidence and peace of mind. Since 1988, PetSafe has been driven by a simple belief: safe, healthy pets lead to happier lives for pets and their families. For over 25 years, we've been dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and the people who love them, treating every pet as a cherished family member and delivering life-changing innovations designed to enrich every moment. With U.S. roots and a global reach, our vet- and trainer-recommended products are built for every pet and backed by exceptional customer support. From backyards to dog parks, we're on a mission to create fields of joy for happy, healthy, and safe pets.

name: Martingale Collar for Dogs, Biothane, Stainless Steel Hardware, No Pull, Made in The USA, Professional Grade, Medium, Black
short_description: SIZE Medium (15" - 19") - The Perfect Martingale Collar for Dogs in Training or Everyday Life. We have different sizes and colors for all dogs. This is one of two collars I use in my training practice for my clients. We are proud to say that many professional trainers/handlers, groups, and owners use our training equipment for their dogs and puppies.

Our Biothane Martingale Collar is Safer and Sturdier than other collars in the industry as we use the hole punch design to prevent the buckle from breaking, snapping or coming loose while using. Please do not leave your dog unsupervised in a crate or as a tie out on a stake (True with any collar). The metal hardware on the collar is made of Stainless Steel to provide much better rust, discoloring and chipping protection that happens more often with cheaper chrome plated hardware.

The Limited Cinch or No Pull Design with a properly sized collar is used to quickly communicate to your dog what you want out of him or her. Remember, proper communication with our dog is a combination of words, touch, treats, toys and positive emotion (see our videos). Feel confident and comfortable working with your dog knowing you are the Leader. He/She will feel it too!

Premium Quality Construction and Materials. Made in the USA. Feel confident that you are purchasing the best quality collars for your dog or puppy. These collars are handcrafted. Made by the Amish ... craftsmen that have spent hundreds of years making things the right way. The collars are constructed with Biothane material, the heir apparent to leather, and use premium stainless steel hardware.

Weatherproof. Odorproof. Waterproof. Our Gummy Collars clean with soap and water. They maintain their feel and durability, and can be used in all kinds of weather and working conditions. We have many different colors and sizes to choose from. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

name: Mighty Paw Martingale Dog Collar 2.0 | Trainer Approved Limited Slip Collar with Stainless Steel Chain & Heavy Duty Buckle - Modified Cinch Collar for Gentle & Effective Pet Training - Medium, Grey
short_description: No More Pulling: experience hassle-free dog training with the Mighty Paw martingale pet training collar, your perfect solution for less pull and more control - tightening under tension but only enough to give a gentle training cue
Recommended by Trainers: Unlike traditional choke collars that use uncontrolled force the Mighty Paw martingale-style collar with chain allows you to gently control your dog on the leash

Built to Last: We made this dog collar for your rough and tumble pup. Mighty Paw knows dogs. Engineered to last with a heavy-duty stainless steel chain that won’t discolor, weather-proof nylon, and reinforced buckle.

Ultimate Versatility: Our collar does it all! We designed this martingale-style collar with two D-rings which allow you to easily switch from a training collar to standard (non-cinch) collar. Feel the Mighty Paw difference and discover the perfect match for your needs with our animal collar option in Grey, Medium

short_description: Adjustable Fit for Every Dog: Wolfgang offers adjustable collars, leashes, and harnesses in sizes to suit dogs of all breeds. Each piece is crafted with strong, durable materials like polyester webbing and sturdy nylon buckles, providing a reliable and comfortable fit for daily walks, training, or outdoor adventures.

Powerful Strength for Active and Strong Dogs: Designed to withstand over 800 pounds of pull strength. It has heavy-duty polyester webbing and reinforced construction, perfect for dogs that pull or have high energy. The welded steel D-ring and sturdy nylon buckles ensure a secure attachment point for your leash, giving you the confidence to control even the most powerful dogs during walks, training, or outdoor play.

Stylish and Functional: The welded steel D-ring and sturdy nylon buckles ensure a secure attachment point for your leash, giving you the confidence to control even the most powerful dogs during walks, training, or outdoor play. UV and stain-resistant materials ensure your gear stays looking sharp, rain or shine, so you can trust it to perform in any weather conditions while keeping your dog looking stylish on every adventure.

Comfort and Security for Every Activity: Outdoor adventures, training sessions, and everyday walks should be comfortable and secure for both you and your dog. Featuring welded, powder-coated steel D-rings, these accessories provide secure leash attachments that won’t fail under pressure, ensuring your dog stays safe and comfortable during all your adventures, from short walks to rugged hikes.

Made for Durability: Wolfgang dog accessories are made with premium craftsmanship, designed to stand up to daily use and the toughest conditions. The durable polyester webbing resists wear and tear, while the adjustable fit ensures a secure and comfortable experience for your dog

name: Mayerzon Dog Collar, Patented Martingale No Pull Collar for Small Medium Large Dogs with Buckle for Walking Training, Hidden Design (Black, Medium,2.5mm,14.5"-18.5" Neck)
short_description: Hidden Dog No Pull Collar: Mayerzon no pull collar for dogs is not simply a cover for a chain collar. The link is built directly into the collar, allowing for unmatched functionality and camouflaging of the link. No more struggling with links to put the collar on and off. This hidden anti pull collar for dogs keeps you from being judged for using a training collar, helps you achieve more control while training or walking

Safe & Effective Training Tool: Equipped with smooth surface links and soft rubber caps, our dog collar martingale provides necessary training pressure while protecting the respiratory tract and sensitive areas of the neck. If used properly, you only have to gently pull the martingale dog collar and your dog will stop pulling immediately

Built to Last for Years: Made from high-quality stainless steel, this martingale collar for dogs with buckle has a rust-free and water-resistant construction that will provide years of use. The premium stitching nylon cover and adjustable pull tab add extra safety to prevent the pull collar for dogs from falling apart. Metal D-ring for attaching dog leash makes walking and training easier

Measure before buying: Our martingale dog collar is easy to adjust and suitable for small medium large dogs. Measure just under the jaw and behind the ears. The measurement should be snug but not tight. For example, if your dog measures 16.5" and is fully grown, a medium collar would work because it fits a neck size that measures 14.5" to 18.5". Please refer to our size chart to select the appropriate size

Hassle-available Service: Please measure before purchase and put the martingale dog collars for large dogs in the right position. The no pull collar for dogs are meant to ride high on the dog’s neck just below the base of the skull. If you have any questions about our dog walking collar no pull, please feel happy to tell us so we can help you solve the problem
